title: Rito,pls hear me out on this one
body:
Your main goal in 8.11 was to nerf crit adcs since that they were too strong and am like thank you that's a good idea but then 

Why the HELL are adcs building ap?! Look at varus and kaisa guys only ad item is rageblade and that item still gives ap!! 

It's literally called ADC aka attack damage carry get that *ATTACK DAMAGE* not *ABILITY POWER*

Riot, I beg of you please find a way to stop adcs from building ap without gutting mages and ap assasins thanks

replies.body: You do know kaisa was made to build ap right? They literally even mention it in her reveal video.

they are attack damage carries if the primary source of their damage is from Auto attacks.

While Kai'sa and Varus could still make an argument for that being true, remember, their class is not "ADC" that is their role in the game. They are marksmen: Ranged damage dealers, who rely primarily on auto attacks.

Corki is a marksmen that deals primarily magic damage, he is another kind of exception. chill out dude, have some pizza or something :)
I don't call varus auto doing 57 damage but his e doing 1000 damage plus passive relying primarily on auto attacks

Varus E only does that much damage IF he lands his 3 auto attacks and procs passive if Im not mistaken.

Optimizing his damage still requires his auto attacks.

It's actually called **Bot**. The role is called bot. An ADC is a subset of *carry* champs that are the most common class of botlaner, but there is no reason one champion must be locked to one role, playstyle, or damage type.

For a prime example, look at tons of toplaners who build health, AP, AD, AS.. basically anything they want.
